lcap-tree-diagram/data-source.description: The data source of the table, the data set object or the logic of returning the data set

lcap-tree-diagram/value-field.description: Attribute of user ID selected value

lcap-tree-diagram/text-field.description: Field name used to display text

lcap-tree-diagram/showChildDotNum.description: Enabled by default; after enabled, the entire number of its child nodes will be displayed

lcap-tree-diagram/parent-field.description: In the element type of the collection, the attribute used to identify the parent node

lcap-tree-diagram/data-entity.description: If it belongs to an anonymous data structure, the data entity name needs to be passed, otherwise it is not used
